description: Ripped Shayne Erickson takes on ambitious newcomer Jimmie Slater. Shayne Erickson brings his experience in Korean martial arts and kickboxing to the mat this week, along with the attitude to back it up. Jimmie is looking for a good fight and assumes that his experience wrestling with his buddies will get him through the day. But it's not long before Shayne's long legs lock him up and take him down again and again. After a match full of humiliation and brutal takedowns, these fighters have no trouble keeping their cocks hard during the entire 3rd round. But it's during the final sex round that we see what's been on both of their minds the entire time.
title: Jimmie Slater vs Shane Erickson
